price: Qaaruuniin, Fir’awniifi Haamaaniinis (balleessineerra). Dhugumatti, Muusaan ragaa ifa ta’een isaanitti dhufeeti, dachii keessatti boonan. (isaan qabne) Kan Nu jalaa miliqan hin taane
arabic: وَقَٰرُونَ وَفِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَۖ وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُم مُّوسَىٰ بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ فَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا كَانُواْ سَٰبِقِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waqārūna wafir'ʿawna wahāmāna walaqad jāahum mūsā bil-bayināti fa-is'takbarū fī al-arḍi wamā kānū sābiqīna
